local_intent: Lower slowly until table contact is detected, retry once if missed, with yaw aligned at 90 degrees, then verify contact.
assumptions: Cloth has been localized and approached from above
Gripper is open and near the cloth
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT by using AtOrientation yaw=90, executing LowerUntilContact with speed=slow, max_depth=0.05, force_threshold=10, timeout=1200, and verifying contact. Retry aligns with recovery note to reattempt contact if missed.
